evs.name: Proof of Studies
evs.description: University degree (AEI) in economics from Greece or a recognized equivalent degree from abroad, or a Technological Educational Institute (TEI) degree in economics from Greece or a recognized equivalent degree from abroad, or a postgraduate degree in economics from Greece or a recognized equivalent degree from abroad.

evs.name: Professional Examination Certificate
evs.description: Certificate of successful completion of the professional examinations conducted by SOEL in accordance with the law.

evs.name: Practical Training Certificate
evs.description: Certificate from a supervising certified public accountant regarding the five-year practical training and the minimum required auditing experience.

evs.name: Insurance Fund Certificate
evs.description: Certificate from the primary insurance fund (e.g., EFKA) proving the applicant's active insurance coverage.

evs.name: Criminal Record
evs.description: General-use criminal record showing that there are no convictions for the offenses specified in Law 4449.

evs.name: Detailed CV
evs.description: Detailed curriculum vitae including information on education, professional experience, and other skills.

evs.name: Candidateâ€™s Solemn Declaration
evs.description: Solemn declaration by the candidate, as required by the regulatory decision of ELTE, confirming the truth of the submitted documents and compliance with legal requirements.
